pr_title: Fixes #3464, App posts deletion request notifications ({{subst:idw}}) on the wrong user's talk page

timeline.message: Fixed #3464: App posts deletion request notifications ({{subst:idw}}) on the wrong user's talk page
Fixed DeleteHelper tests and null-pointer exception

timeline.bodyText:
If the creator name is null, I think it is better to raise an exception as
throw new RuntimeException("Failed to nominate for deletion"); instead of appending edits to the page of "https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/User_talk:page does not exist". So please raise the exception instead of filling the null string with "page not exist"
timeline.author: neslihanturan

timeline.message: Raising exception when nominating for deletion with empty creator name
